general.blacklistwarndesc: Please do not use everyone or here in your messages
general.blacklistwarnfooter: This is an automated warning for say and embed generator commands
general.aboutdesc: Here you can see credits and bot information
general.aboutauthortext: Initial code based on NigamanRPG#6937 KonsoleBot which is now abandonware , this version is maintaned by Middlle#7488
general.aboutthankstext: NigamanRPG#6937(Now deleted account) for konsolebot code on https://computerteam.tk:4600/ , Plastik#5004 for setname command code , and other opensource projects for snippets of code
general.botownererrorembeddesc: You need the ``Bot Owner`` permission to do this.

moderation.dm_ban: You have been banned on server **{0}**. Reason: **{1}**
moderation.dm_kick: You have been kicked from **{0}**. Reason: **{1}**.
moderation.on_not_full_multiban: Failed to block the following users: {0}
moderation.on_mute_role_create: A role has been created on the server, which will be issued to users who are caught in the mute. You can customize it in the server settings. The bot sets all permissions for it automaticaly.
moderation.shutdownembeddesc: Bot is going for shutdown/restart - wait patiently

error.cannot_ban_user: You cannot ban a user whose role is higher than that of a bot.
error.too_long_name: Nickname length must not exceed 32 characters.
error.missing_perms: You do not have sufficient rights to execute this command.
error.missing_bot_perms:
I do not have sufficient rights to execute this command. Grant the following permissions: ```diff
{0}```
error.cooldown: A delay is set for the execution of this command, repeat the attempt in **{:.0f}** seconds.
error.on_error_text:
An unexpected error has occurred! All information about the error has already been sent on to the developers! Mini traceback:
```{0}```

music.embed_controler_playlistadddesc: For checking song list use queue
music.playererrortwo: There is no song to play as the queue is empty.
music.pauseerror: The music is already paused duh
music.stoptext: The player has been stopped and the queue has been cleared
music.queueerror: There is nothing in the queue duh
music.queueerrordesc: Try adding some songs in the queue or smth
music.voicechannel_error_notconnected: You must be connected to a voice channel or provide one to connect to.
music.music_pm_notavailable: Music commands are not available in Private Messages!
music.wrong_commandchannel: {ctx.author.mention}, you must be in {player.context.channel.mention} for this session.
music.wrong_voicechannel: {ctx.author.mention}, you must be in `{channel.name}` to use voice commands.
music.error_nosongfound: No songs were found with that query. Please try again.
music.adminpause: An admin or DJ has paused the player.
music.votepausepass: Vote to pause passed. Pausing player.
music.ongoingvotepausepass: {ctx.author.mention} has voted to pause the player.
music.adminresume: An admin or DJ has resumed the player.
music.voteresumepass: Vote to resume passed. Resuming player.
music.ongoingvoteresumepass: {ctx.author.mention} has voted to resume the player.
music.adminskip: An admin or DJ has skipped the song.
music.requesterskip: The song requester has skipped the song.
music.voteskippass: Vote to skip passed. Skipping song.
music.nomoretrackstext: No more tracks left in queue
music.nomoretracksprevdesc: You ran out of previous tracks
music.ongoingvoteskippass: {ctx.author.mention} has voted to skip the song.
music.adminstop: An admin or DJ has stopped the player.
music.votestoppass: Vote to stop passed. Stopping the player.
music.ongoingvotestoppass: {ctx.author.mention} has voted to stop the player.
music.djadminvolume: Only the DJ or admins may change the volume.
music.invalidvolumevalue: Please enter a value between 1 and 100.
music.invalidvolumevaluedesc: Invalid value provided- Please enter a value between 1 and 100.
music.shufflewarn: Add more songs to the queue before shuffling.
music.adminshuffle: An admin or DJ has shuffled the playlist.
music.voteshufflepass: Vote to shuffle passed. Shuffling the playlist.
music.ongoingvoteshufflepass: {ctx.author.mention} has voted to shuffle the playlist.
music.eqwarn: Only the DJ or admins may change the equalizer.
music.nomoretracks: There are no more songs in the queue.
music.djswapwarn: Only admins and the DJ may use this command.
music.djswapinvalid: {member} is not currently in voice, so can not be a DJ.
music.djswaptosameperson: Cannot swap DJ to the current DJ... :)
music.nomoremembersfordjswap: No more members to swap to.

bot_log.logged_as: The bot has been successfully launched under the tag "{0}"!
bot_log.log_cmd: [{0}] @{1} used the command {2} on the server {3}
